key.name: only-main-monitor
key.summary: Only remove the top bar of inwdows in the main monitor.
key.description: If windows are on an external monitor, this setting will ensure the top bar stays visible.

key.name: button-position
key.summary: Button position in the top panel
key.description: Controls whether and where buttons of maximized windows appear in the top panel. Possible values are: "before-app-menu" to display buttons before the application name, "after-app-menu" to display buttons after the application name, "within-status-area" to display buttons within the system status area, "after-status-area" to display buttons after the system status area and "hidden" to not show buttons at all.

key.name: change-appmenu
key.summary: Only remove the top bar of inwdows in the main monitor.
key.description: If windows are on an external monitor, this setting will ensure the top bar stays visible.
